Smart_Controller.name: Smart Controller

embodiment.principle: Microcontroller with sensors and wireless connectivity.
embodiment.description: Real-time monitoring and control via mobile app.

physics_models.name: Processing Load
physics_models.coding_directives: tasks are the number of concurrent tasks, processing_speed is in MHz, memory_usage is in MB.
physics_models.python_code:
def calculate_load(tasks, processing_speed, memory_usage):
    return (tasks / processing_speed) * memory_usage
physics_models.coder_notes: This model estimates the processing load on the controller.

Smart_Controller.verification_plan: Test the controller's response time and ability to handle multiple tasks simultaneously.
